titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3) to approve the construction, operation, and maintenance of the Keystone XL pipeline, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-88, by Mr. Webster (FL).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3 with 1 hour and 30 minutes of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 27.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 228.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 194 (Roll no. 167).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 185 (Roll no. 168).

bill.summary: 5/21/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3) to approve the construction, operation, and maintenance of the Keystone XL pipeline.
